function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Unnecessary stand-by plug loads, such as computers, contributing to high energy consumption","Empty refrigerators contributing to high energy consumption","Overcrowding and space issues in a city like London","Poor housing conditions with inadequate sanitation facilities and fresh water supply increase outbreak risks","Encroachment of natural habitats and closer encounters with wildlife increase the risk of zoonotic infections","Inadequate ventilation and confined spaces in buildings increase COVID-19 transmission risk","High usage of crowded public transport increases the risk of disease transmission","Threat of a second wave of COVID-19 and future pandemics","High rate of virus positivity from floor swab samples in ICU and GW, indicating contamination of the built environment","Exposure to damp, mold, cold, polluted, over-crowded, noisy dwellings","Coercive control, physical, psychological, or sexual violence by an intimate partner or family member"]}
